channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Chrysler recalls some 2022-2025 Pacifica and Voyager vehicles to fix a potential airbag issue
item.description: Chrysler is voluntarily recalling some of its 2022-2025 Pacifica and Voyager vehicles to replace their side curtain airbags, if needed.

item.title: In words and photos, rural Alaska residents reflect on their village’s sustainable practices
Protesters line highway in Florida Everglades to oppose ‘Alligator Alcatraz’
